pages.text: This architecture can be used with just one block, and there is no multi-block structure required. $(br2)This block has two modes: $(br2)1. Embedding Gemstones: $(br2)Place any $(6)EMCWorld Energy Relic$() on the left and the gemstone on the right.

2. Removing Gemstones: $(br2)Leave the right side empty, and place a $(6)EMCWorld Energy Relic$() that has already embedded a gemstone on the left. $(br2)Close the GUI, then right-click the block while sneaking with an empty hand to start working. $(c)At present$(), the enhancement is always successful and has no cooldown time.

There are four types of gemstones that can be embedded: $(#bc3b29)Bloody Gemstone$(), $(#55c024)Natural Gemstone$(), $(#2470c0)Lake Quiet Gemstone$(), and $(#8f24c0)Abyssal Gemstone$(). $(br2)Due to the influence of unknown energy forces, this book cannot explain the differences between these gemstones, and players need to explore them on their own.
